ORIGAM Documentation : Data Structure Reference

Created by Tomáš Vavrda, last modified by Eva Čechurová on Jul 24, 2017

This element allows you to pass query information about data structure, when calling the DataService.LoadData method.

Attributes

DataStructureSelects which data structure you want to reference.
FilterSet (optional)When needed, select a filter set, in order to limit the number of records returned. When DataService.StoreData is called, the value is ignored.
